member.name: T:SiliconStudio.Xenko.UI.StretchDirection
member.summary: Describes how scaling applies to content and restricts scaling to named axis types.

member.name: F:SiliconStudio.Xenko.UI.StretchDirection.Both
member.summary: The content stretches to fit the parent according to the Stretch mode.

member.name: F:SiliconStudio.Xenko.UI.StretchDirection.DownOnly
member.summary: The content scales downward only when it is larger than the parent. If the content is smaller, no scaling upward is performed.

member.name: F:SiliconStudio.Xenko.UI.StretchDirection.UpOnly
member.summary: The content scales upward only when it is smaller than the parent. If the content is larger, no scaling downward is performed.

member.name: T:SiliconStudio.Xenko.UI.StretchType
member.summary: Describes how content is resized to fill its allocated space.

member.name: F:SiliconStudio.Xenko.UI.StretchType.None
member.summary: The content preserves its original size.

member.name: F:SiliconStudio.Xenko.UI.StretchType.Uniform
member.summary: The content is resized to fit in the destination dimensions while it preserves its native aspect ratio.

member.name: F:SiliconStudio.Xenko.UI.StretchType.UniformToFill
member.summary: The content is resized to fill the destination dimensions while it preserves its native aspect ratio. If the aspect ratio of the destination rectangle differs from the source, the source content is clipped to fit in the destination dimensions.

member.name: F:SiliconStudio.Xenko.UI.StretchType.FillOnStretch
member.summary: The content is resized to fill the destination when stretched by its parent. It keeps its ratio otherwise.

member.name: F:SiliconStudio.Xenko.UI.StretchType.Fill
member.summary: The content is always resized to fill the destination dimensions. The aspect ratio is not preserved.

member.name: E:SiliconStudio.Xenko.UI.UIElement.TouchDown
member.summary: Occurs when the user starts touching the . That is when he moves its finger down from the element.
member.remarks: A click event is bubbling

member.name: E:SiliconStudio.Xenko.UI.UIElement.TouchEnter
member.summary: Occurs when the user enters its finger into . That is when his finger was on the screen outside of the element and moved inside the element.
member.remarks: A click event is bubbling

member.name: E:SiliconStudio.Xenko.UI.UIElement.TouchLeave
member.summary: Occurs when the user leaves its finger from the . That is when his finger was inside of the element and moved on the screen outside of the element.
member.remarks: A click event is bubbling

member.name: E:SiliconStudio.Xenko.UI.UIElement.TouchMove
member.summary: Occurs when the user move its finger inside the . That is when his finger was already on the element and moved from its previous position.
member.remarks: A click event is bubbling

member.name: E:SiliconStudio.Xenko.UI.UIElement.TouchUp
member.summary: Occurs when the user stops touching the . That is when he moves its finger up from the element.
member.remarks: A click event is bubbling

member.name: E:SiliconStudio.Xenko.UI.UIElement.KeyPressed
member.summary: Occurs when the element has the focus and the user press a key on the keyboard.
member.remarks: A key pressed event is bubbling

member.name: E:SiliconStudio.Xenko.UI.UIElement.KeyDown
member.summary: Occurs when the element has the focus and the user maintains a key pressed on the keyboard.
member.remarks: A key down event is bubbling

member.name: E:SiliconStudio.Xenko.UI.UIElement.KeyReleased
member.summary: Occurs when the element has the focus and the user release a key on the keyboard.
member.remarks: A key released event is bubbling
